item.title: 2025 Jan 4 — Daily Thoughts
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Jan 4 15:24:42.803568

Happy New Year!

Another few days without diary. Just because I literally haven't done anything these days. I have been packing up and planning my trip back to China.

item.title: 2024 Dec 27 — Daily Thoughts
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Dec 27 12:13:32.125838

I watched the quantum field theory course told by Prof. Hong Liu, very impressive! I should watch more video forms of courses instead of just reading the books and learn it by myself. Just reading books is sometimes misleading. Listenning to a course is more clear for me.

Keep this in mind, and try to watch more videos to learn in the future.

Dec 25 10:43:54.173522

I toyally forgot this thing this few days. Around christmas, I didn't do so many things, just read some paper about altermagnets. And, it is worth mention that I have arranged my Zotero and now it's very clear.

item.title: 2024 Dec 21 — Daily Thoughts
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Dec 21 14:50:40.509063

I just upload my research diary to my personal website! Very excited.

Also, Today I said goodbye to all the group members. I am leaving USA very soon. Little sad about that.

item.title: 2024 Dec 20 — Daily Thoughts
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Dec 20 15:48:54.019866

Today I just read some articles. I am suprised that Prof.Liao have published many PRL on Cd3As2.

Also, I have been thinking about the space group and symmetry.

List of today's articles:

  • Observation of a three-dimensional topological Dirac semimetal phase in high-mobility Cd3As2
  • Dual quantum spin Hall insulator by density-tuned correlations in TaIrTe4
  • Electric Control of Fermi Arc Spin Transport in Individual Topological Semimetal Nanowires
  • Observation of an Odd-Integer Quantum Hall Effect from Topological Surface States in Cd3As2

item.title: 2024 Dec 19 — Daily Thoughts
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Dec 19 03:38:15.073466

I forgot to write these days, I was busy about my midterm check of my theis. I finished yesterday.

I really need to adjust my schedule, go to bed earlier, get up earlier.

item.title: 2024 Dec 13 — Daily Thoughts
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Dec 13 12:36:29.214697

Not so much to say today. I read the tokura's article about half quantized Experimental signature of the parity anomaly in a semi-magnetic topological insulator. Still there are some questions I didn't quite understand such as why the Rxx of half-quantized is not zero. I need to think twice.

item.title: 2024 Dec 12 — Daily Thoughts
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Dec 12 14:38:33.023860

Today I tested MnTe wet etching recipe with Lingjie, H3PO4: H2O2 : H2O = 1 : 1 : 25 for 2 minutes is a good way. Good job!

item.title: 2024 Dec 12 — Daily Thoughts

item.content:encoded:
Dec 12 05:15:29.845248

Last three days I had a short trip to Philadelphia, it is a lovely city.

Today I listened the talk by Xiao-Xiao Zhang, University of Florida about using optical methods to detect spin flop in AFM, nice talk.

Nov 29 11:59:56.159902

Not too much to say, today is thanksgiving, I didn't go to the lab and stayed at home. I had dinner with Lingjie and Zijie, really enjoyable.

item.title: Interesting: Physics / Condensed matter field theory — 2024.11.29
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
2024.11.29

The crucial point to understand Feynman path integral of Harmonic ossilators is that in the momentum space the particle is actually free, so the integral is a constant. Also, the paths near classic path is just like classic Harmonic ossilators.

item.title: Interesting: Physics / Condensed matter field theory — 2024.11.29
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
2024.11.29

Anti-symmetry and symmetry are very useful thoughts when sloving two-body bonding problem. Just consider Hamiltonian to be a 2D matrix, and add bonding term to it. The solution will come two terms as anti-symmetry and symmetry with different energy.

Nov 28 13:59:42.206238

Nov 27 13:47:13.950479

Today I helped Zijie and Lingjie wire two samples. Arrived home very late, the street was empty, I walked home from lab, feeling very lonely. But the sky was really beautiful, the stars were shining.

Also I tried to understand the fundmental thinking ways in field theory.

item.title: 2024 Nov 23 — Daily Thoughts
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Nov 23 14:19:07.635939

Today Lingjie graduated, we drunk Champin together. Congradulations to him! I was superised to find Jiatao has talked to many professors yet. I need to send more e-mials after thanksgiving.

I also read about some paper about topological semimetals, TaIrTe4 is an interesting materials actually. Maybe I should use it as the platform for my graudate thesis.

Not many things to say. But ETS is such a asshole. My TOFEL socre is 91, not even higher than my first time.

I should read more paper on topological semimetals. Need to come up with a new idea.

item.title: Dialog of Changes
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Dialg of changes

Version 1.00 has published. Basic structures is confirmed.

Version1.10

Use python to help type-in contexts. Advantage:

  • won't be disturbed by so many contexts
  • effecinet and elegant
  • easier to process and orgnize contexts

Version1.20 11:48:15.103370

The update rate is really fast! This Version create collapsible div for the website. And add time to each edit.

item.title: 2024 Nov 21 — Daily Thoughts
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Nov 21 11:41:43.833514

Today I updated the apperance of the website and added collapsible div into the HTML. Now the website looks much sharper. Good job!

One more word: I really need to get up earlier.

item.title: 2024 Nov 20 — Daily Thoughts
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Nov 20

I have been working on HTML type-in python program yesterday and today. It was great fun. The program has basic function now. Very happy about this!

Today I sent e-mial to Cory Dean, no response yet. I think maybe he is not interested in me. But don't give up! Just keep trying. Sending e-mail is at least better than doing noting.

item.title: 2024 Nov 18 — Daily Thoughts
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Nov 18 00:14

Now is Nov 18 00:14, I have made up my mind to build a web for myself. Yesterday(actually the day before yesterday) I learnt something about HTML, I thought it was perfect to keep a record, and I also have the idea to write everything interesting down. HTML is great, and I can add some fancy stuff after I learn CSS. So I do this. Great start, I wish I can keep on.

Today actually not many things to say, I played badminton and knew many things about Majorana and Hao Zhang from Cuizu, very interesting.

item.title: Preface
item.dc:creator: zhiyuan
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to My Research Diary

Welcome to my research diary, I will put everything interesting here. Established by Zhiyuan, November 17,2024, Pennsylvania.

Basic structure

Basics structure should contain daily thoughts, new-learnt interesting things, dialog of changes, and so on.

Dialog of changes

So, dialog of changes is dialog of changes.

Daily thoughts

The diary contains daily thoughts when I do research. When writes daily thoughts:

  • "daily thoughts" should be h1
  • the year should be h2
  • the date should be title h3
and other things like feelings, outcomes and experiment preduces should be written down.

New-learnt interesting things

The diary should contain interesting things I just learnt. When writes new-learnt interesting things:

  • "New learnt Interesting things" should be h1
  • the area should be h2
  • the year and date should be title h3
and also keep record of the source and critical points.
